languages.text: {n}Мужчина с изможденным лицом, состоящим будто бы из одних костей, вперивает в вас по-птичьи немигающий взгляд. Простые черные одежды священнослужителя практически ничем не украшены и не способны скрыть его болезненную худобу. Надтреснутым голосом он произносит:{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} защищает, {mf|сыне|дщерь}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Мужчина с изможденным лицом, состоящим будто бы из одних костей, вперивает в вас по-птичьи немигающий взгляд. Простые черные одежды священнослужителя практически ничем не украшены и не способны скрыть его болезненную худобу. Надтреснутым голосом он произносит:{/n} "Император защищает, {mf|сыне|дщерь}".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}The man with a face so drawn it appears to be made of nothing but skin and bone fixes his unblinking, birdlike eyes on you. The priest's simple black clothes have next to no adornments, and they do nothing to mask his unhealthy gauntness. In a cracked voice, he says,{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина с изможденным лицом, состоящим будто бы из одних костей, вперивает в вас по-птичьи немигающий взгляд. Простые черные одежды священнослужителя практически ничем не украшены и не способны скрыть его болезненную худобу. Надтреснутым голосом он произносит:{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} защищает, {mf|сыне|дщерь}".

traits.locale_text: {n}The man with a face so haggard that there's nothing but skin and bones fixes his unblinking, birdlike eyes on you. The priest's simple black clothes have next to no adornments, and they can do nothing to mask his unhealthy gauntness. In a cracked voice, he says,{/n} "The Emperor protects, {mf|son|daughter}."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: {n}The man with a face so haggard that there's nothing but skin and bones fixes his unblinking, birdlike eyes on you. The priest's simple black clothes have next to no adornments, and they can do nothing to mask his unhealthy gauntness. In a cracked voice, he says,{/n} "The Emperor protects, {mf|son|daughter}."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: {n}The man with a face so drawn it appears to be made of nothing but skin and bone fixes his unblinking, birdlike eyes on you. The priest's simple black clothes have next to no adornments, and they do nothing to mask his unhealthy gauntness. In a cracked voice, he says,{/n} "The Emperor protects, my {mf|son|daughter}."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: {n}The man with a face so drawn it appears to be made of nothing but skin and bone fixes his unblinking, birdlike eyes on you. The priest's simple black clothes have next to no adornments, and they do nothing to mask his unhealthy gauntness. In a cracked voice, he says,{/n} "The Emperor protects, my {mf|son|daughter}."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: {n}The man with a face so drawn it appears to be made of nothing but skin and bone fixes his unblinking, birdlike eyes on you. The priest's simple black clothes have next to no adornments, and they do nothing to mask his unhealthy gauntness. In a cracked voice, he says,{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}这个人的脸瘦得吓人，完全已经是皮包骨头了。他像鸟一样的眼睛一眨不眨地盯着你，简单的黑色衣物几乎没有任何装饰，也无法掩盖他病态的憔悴。他用嘶哑的声音开了口。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}保佑众生。”
languages.original_text: {n}The man with a face so drawn it appears to be made of nothing but skin and bone fixes his unblinking, birdlike eyes on you. The priest's simple black clothes have next to no adornments, and they do nothing to mask his unhealthy gauntness. In a cracked voice, he says,{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个人的脸瘦得吓人，完全已经是皮包骨头了。他像鸟一样的眼睛一眨不眨地盯着你，简单的黑色衣物几乎没有任何装饰，也无法掩盖他病态的憔悴。他用嘶哑的声音开了口。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}保佑众生，我的{mf|孩子|女儿}。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}El hombre, con un rostro tan demacrado que parece que solo lo componen piel y huesos, fija en ti su imperturbable mirada de pájaro. El ropaje negro del sacerdote carece de adornos, y no hace nada por disimular su condición física. Con voz quebrada, anuncia:{/n} «El {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} nos protege».
languages.original_text: {n}The man with a face so drawn it appears to be made of nothing but skin and bone fixes his unblinking, birdlike eyes on you. The priest's simple black clothes have next to no adornments, and they do nothing to mask his unhealthy gauntness. In a cracked voice, he says,{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre, con un rostro tan demacrado que parece que solo lo componen piel y huesos, fija en ti su imperturbable mirada de pájaro. El ropaje negro del sacerdote carece de adornos, y no hace nada por disimular su condición física. Con voz quebrada, anuncia:{/n} «El {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} nos protege, hij{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}皮膚と骨だけでできているように見えるほど引きつった顔の男が、まばたきもせず、猛禽のような目をこちらに向けている。司祭の黒い簡素な服にはほとんど装飾がなく、彼の不健康な貧弱さがあらわになっている。彼はしゃがれた声で話しかけてきた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}がお守りくださっている」
languages.original_text: {n}The man with a face so drawn it appears to be made of nothing but skin and bone fixes his unblinking, birdlike eyes on you. The priest's simple black clothes have next to no adornments, and they do nothing to mask his unhealthy gauntness. In a cracked voice, he says,{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects."

traits.locale_text: {n}皮膚と骨だけでできているように見えるほど引きつった顔の男が、まばたきもせず、猛禽のような目をこちらに向けている。司祭の黒い簡素な服にはほとんど装飾がなく、彼の不健康な貧弱さがあらわになっている。彼はしゃがれた声で話しかけてきた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}が我が{mf|息子|娘}をお守りくださっている」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}Ein Mann mit einem so verhärmten Gesicht, dass es nur aus Haut und Knochen zu bestehen scheint, fixiert dich mit seinen starr blickenden, vogelähnlichen Augen. Die einfache schwarze Kleidung des Priesters ist so gut wie unverziert und kaschiert seine ungesunde Hagerkeit in keiner Weise. Mit heiserer Stimme verkündet er:{/n} "Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} schützt."
languages.original_text: {n}The man with a face so drawn it appears to be made of nothing but skin and bone fixes his unblinking, birdlike eyes on you. The priest's simple black clothes have next to no adornments, and they do nothing to mask his unhealthy gauntness. In a cracked voice, he says,{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Mann mit einem so verhärmten Gesicht, dass es nur aus Haut und Knochen zu bestehen scheint, fixiert dich mit seinen starr blickenden, vogelähnlichen Augen. Die einfache schwarze Kleidung des Priesters ist so gut wie unverziert und kaschiert seine ungesunde Hagerkeit in keinster Weise. Seine Stimme klingt gebrochen.{/n} "Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} schützt Euch, {mf|mein Sohn|meine Tochter}."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}L'homme aux traits si tirés que son visage semble ne plus avoir que la peau sur les os pose son regard d'oiseau sur vous, sans jamais cligner. La tenue noire toute simple du prêtre est presque entièrement dépourvue d'ornements et ne masque en rien sa maigreur maladive. D'une voix chevrotante, il déclare :{/n} « Que l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} vous protège. »
languages.original_text: {n}The man with a face so drawn it appears to be made of nothing but skin and bone fixes his unblinking, birdlike eyes on you. The priest's simple black clothes have next to no adornments, and they do nothing to mask his unhealthy gauntness. In a cracked voice, he says,{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme aux traits si tirés que son visage semble ne plus avoir que la peau sur les os pose son regard d'oiseau sur vous, sans jamais cligner. La tenue noire toute simple du prêtre est presque entièrement dépourvue d'ornements et ne masque en rien sa maigreur maladive. D'une voix chevrotante, il déclare :{/n} « Que l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} vous protège, {mf|mon fils|ma fille}. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}Yüzü gerilmekten sırf deri ve kemikten ibaretmiş gibi görünen adam, kuşunkine benzeyen hiç kırpmadığı gözlerini sana dikiyor. Rahibin siyah, sade, aksesuardan hemen hemen yoksun kıyafeti; sağlıksız derecedeki sıskalığını gizlemek için hiç çaba göstermiyor. Adam, çatlak sesiyle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} korur."
languages.original_text: {n}The man with a face so drawn it appears to be made of nothing but skin and bone fixes his unblinking, birdlike eyes on you. The priest's simple black clothes have next to no adornments, and they do nothing to mask his unhealthy gauntness. In a cracked voice, he says,{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüzündeki kan çekilmiş ve âdeta bir deri bir kemik kalmış gibi görünen adam kuşa benzer gözlerini kırpmadan sana bakıyor. Rahibin siyah, sade kıyafetlerinde neredeyse hiç aksesuar yok ve sağlıksız derecedeki sıskalığını gizlemek adına hiçbir işe yaramıyorlar. Çatlak sesiyle konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} korur."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
